ofx:section.ofx:paragraph:
The first thing you need to install, is Eclipse Luna for Java EE Developers. You can download it from:
www.eclipse.org/downloads After finishing your download unpack Eclipse Luna to your installation path. For example C:\program files\eclipse The next step is to define your workspace. You need a unique one (e.g. workspaceLuna), if you are using multiple versions of eclipse.

ofx:section.ofx:title: Subversion (SVN)
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: For the installation of "Subversive Team Provider 2.0", you have to go to the Eclipse Marketplace. You will find it: Help -> Eclipse Marketplace Search for "Subversive". Mark and install "SVN Team Provider 2.0" (see figure below). Follow these steps:

l:item.ofx:paragraph: Please press Confirm to start the installation.
Press OK (Proceed even if "Subversive SVN Team Provider 2.0" is not available).
Now press Finish and restart eclipse to confirm your changes.

ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: Now select "New" from the File menu and choose "Other...", search for "Maven" and "Checkout Maven Projects from SCM", press "Next" and go for the writing "Find more SCM connectors in the m2e Marketplace" (see figure below). Find: "Subversive" and select "m2e-subversive" and press "Finish". Follow these steps:

l:item.ofx:paragraph: Please press Next to start the installation.
Press OK, if there is a warning for "unsigned contend" to proceed.
Now press Finish and restart eclipse to confirm your changes.

ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: If you were asked for an SVN KIT, please select "SVN KIT 1.8.6".

ofx:section.ofx:title: Checkout Project From SVN Repository
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: The next part of the installation is to "Checkout a Project From SVN Repository". Go to the top menu and press "window", open "show view", go to "other", look for "SVN" and click "SVN Repositories", select "New" and "Repository Location", enter the URL (see below) and the password, press "Finish". Now you are able to the see the repository location and right click on "trunk", select "Checkout as Maven Project", click on "Next" and "Finish".
Since the Maven build tool is downloading all dependencies for the project while setting it up in eclipse, this process takes very long when triggered the first time.

ofx:section.ofx:title: Maven GIT Connector
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: Now right click on your "Project Explorer", select "new", press "Other", search for "Maven" and "Checkout Maven Projects from SCM", press "Next" and go for the writing "Find more SCM connectors in the m2e Marketplace". Find: "m2e" and select "m2e-egit" and press "finish". Follow these steps:

ofx:section.ofx:title: Checkout GIT repository
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: The next part of the installation is to "Checkout a GIT Repository". Now right click on your "Project Explorer", select "new", press "Other", search for "Maven" and "Checkout Maven Projects from SCM", press "Next" and copy the SCM URL to the text field and click "Next".
